Package fr.sy43.studzero.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddPayment
    Activity that is used to create a new payment
    AddPayments
    Activity that shows the payments that have bee done for the current budget
    CustomAdapter
    custom adapter for the recycler view of the new budget 2 screen (select the categories to keep from the old budget)
    CustomAdapter2
    CustomAdapter for the new budget 5 recycler view
    History  
    Home
    Activity that is used for the home screen of the app
    MainActivity
    This is the fist activity that is called when the app is launched
    New_Budget_1
    First screen of the creation of a budget : total income input
    New_Budget_2
    2nd screen of the creation of a new budget : select the categories you want to keep from the old budget
    New_Budget_3
    3rd screen of the budget's creation display the allocated amount and the available amount allows to setup the estimated expenses of a category provide a button to add a new category provide a button to go to the review all screen
    New_Budget_4
    4th screen of a new budget creation : add a new category
    New_Budget_5
    5th screen of a new budget creation Display all the information : allocated amount, budget amount, categories with their allocated amount and a progress bar to show the %of the total budget A confirm button to finish the creation of the budget
    PreviousBudgetStats
    Activity used to display stats about a previous budget
    Settings
    This class is used for the settings screen of the app
    Stats
    Activity that show the stats of the current budget
